mapper.select: SELECT A.prd_id ,A.prd_no , B.cate_name , C.sub_cate_name, A.prd_spec, A.prd_desc , A.prd_tol, A.prd_temp, A.prd_type, A.prd_maker , A.update_date FROM prd_product_manage A LEFT JOIN prd_part_category B ON A.cate_id = B.cate_id LEFT JOIN prd_part_sub_category C ON A.sub_cate_id = C.sub_cate_id ORDER BY prd_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM prd_product_manage A left join prd_part_category B ON A.cate_id = B.cate_id left join prd_part_sub_category C ON A.sub_cate_id = C.sub_cate_id where A.prd_no = #{prdNo}
